item.title: About me
item.description: Gerardo J. Rodriguez Information Email gerardo.jrac@gmail.com “When you look into an abyss, the abyss also looks into you.” Okay Nietszche, let’s not be that dramatic. Here are my credentials: 1) I am a bioinformatician, 2) I enjoy sharing the intuition behind maths and statistics, 3) Fortunately, I am still learning Resume Education Experience Projects Skills &amp; Qualifications
